archimate:BusinessObject.name: StrictSchedulingService
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
The simplest type of Scheduler is a Priority scheduler. This type of Scheduler assigns each Queue a priority, and then visits each Queue in priority order. However, as long as a Queue of a higher priority has traffic enqueued, Queues of lower priority are starved.
Still, there are advantages to this type of Scheduler, especially when dealing with voice traffic.
Other types of Schedulers that provide strict rules about Queue servicing can be derived from this class.
